info.plot: Big Time Boxing presents Kane Watts vs Ranjeet Singh live on FITE straight from the Melbourne Pavilion.

People’s Fighters World Series are live and Free on FITE! The event features two fights with the title on the line - one in the main event of the evening when Jadier Harrera faces off Jeff Ofori for the WBC International Title and for the WBC Middle East Title where Dayan Gonzalez takes on Joseph Ambo.
XPW returned to the Derby Room in Pomona, CA bringing fans Halloween in Hell III
Phoenix Championship is a Muay Thai and Mixed Martial Arts organization, promoting the best MMA and Muay Thai fighters around the world.
Rogue MMA 4 pits Kitt The Killer Campbell vs Beau Ruthless Rawiri fight in Melbourne Pavilion, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

Grapplefest 13 is live on FITE straight from Fusion Night Club in Liverpool, UK! The fight card has well over 14 matches and will have Jacob Couch vs Silviu Nastasa as main event. Who will come out on top?

name: New Era Promotion: Fight Night 2, St-Hyacinthe - Prelims

info.plot: New Era Promotion presents Fight Night 2 in St-Hyacinthe live on FITE! The fight card will have well over 13 matches and will have Alexis Barriere vs Adam Braidwood as main event of the evening. The co-main event Yan Pellerin takes on Ruben Eduardo Acosta for the NABO Championship. Tune in, and watch right here on FITE!

name: Caribe Royale Orlando: Kevin Brown vs Adriano Profirio Ramirez

info.plot: Caribe Royale Orlando presents Championship Boxing Night live on FITE! the fight card has well over 15 announced matches and will have Kevin Brown vs Adriano Profirio Ramirez fighting for the WBA Fedecentro Super Lightweights Title as main event.

name: DFC 15: Adam Collett vs John Loughhead

info.plot: DFC 15 - Diamondback Fighting Championship 15: Hybrid pits Tristan Mad Dog Murphy vs Shane AAA Mitchell fight in Adelaide Oval, Adelaide, South Australia, Australia

name: Triller Fight Club: Lineage of Greatness II - Prelims

info.plot: Kick off Triller Fight Club\'s Lineage of Greatness II with a Prelims! Lineage of Greatness II is on the horizon and what better way to get you started? Tune in and get a feel for the big night ahead!

name: Triller Fight Club: Prograis vs Redkach

info.plot: Watch Prograis vs Redkach (Replay) on FITE for Free! Tune in and get a feel for the big night when Prograis faces off Zepeda live on FITE!

name: Hardcore Promotions 7: Isaac Tomlinson vs Cian Lougheed

info.plot: Hardcore Promotions 7 are live on FITE straight from Melbourne Pavillion in Australia. The fight card is already stacked, it will have 11 matches and will have 62kg Isaac Tomlinson vs Cian Lougheed as main event of the evening.
Tanko Muay Thai League is a glorious exhibition of world calss Mauy Thai.

All Seasons Kite Movie tells the story of the best kitesurfers as they describe what the sport is all about. Not only telling their story on water but behind the scenes and the atmosphere in which they live on dry land. The film looks at the hard work of the athletes to achieve growth and success in a challenging international environment and the living legends of the sport talk about its origins and evolution.
Alex Hirschi started her own vlog reviewing the world’s most exclusive and expensive supercars and her meteoric rise has seen her gain millions of followers and her very own TV Series.
Racing Driver Arie Luyendyk Jr. challenges two celebrities kickboxer Rico Verhoeven and footballer Sol Campbell to see who is the fastest around the track.

This film is the compilation of several of the most epic windsurfing travel adventures ever undertaken by Thomas Miklautsch. He somehow not only windsurfed some indescribable conditions, but he also managed to get it all on film in a National Geographic documentary meets windsurfing sort of way.  Simply amazing.  This video is a journey unto itself.  No further explication necessary, you just have to watch it.

Smitten would like to introduce the team.  Meet our star, Zac Vertrees.  Are you smitten with Smitten?  Prepare for the white knuckle, action packed, thrill ride.  Starring Australia\'s best Rock Climbers and BASE jumper.

Get ready for high-octane thrills! Super Speedway delivers heart-pounding racing action that’ll keep you on the edge of your seat. Stream this awesome motorsports adventure free on STIRR - no signup hassle, just pure adrenaline-fueled entertainment for speed junkies!

The Pursuit reflects the lives of motivated, up-and-coming, young surfers from around the globe.  Filmed in South Africa, Australia, Indonesia, Samoa, Tahiti, California, France, Nicaragua, Mexico, the movie features high-performance maneuvers by a new generation of WSQ surfers who are pushing the envelope of progressive performance surfing.

Amidst vibrant landscapes and ancient predators, the team races against time to complete their findings and escape the planet, battling both the elements and their own fears. Staring Bazil Rathbone and the queen of scream, Faith Domergue

Staring Tom Hardy. A story of a young Englishman’s physical and spiritual journey during Algeria’s battle for independence from France. Driven by romantic illusion to join the French Foreign Legion. A timeless, coming of age story set against the epic, sweeping landscape of North Africa.
A female police officer has her hands full clearing up a Pittsburgh neighborhood and trying to clear her late father’s name on corruption charges.

Trapped in their home during a brutal storm, a couple is taken hostage by armed men with a secret cargo. As danger closes in from all sides, they’ll need more than luck to survive. Landfall is a storm-fueled thriller where nothing is what it seems.
The Arrangement is a short crime / drama film about a hitchhiker who finds herself intertwined with three different individuals and fifty-thousand stolen dollars.
Who is the rat? This crew will go to any lengths necessary to find out. Everything is not what it seems.
Bad Habits is a short film about a librarian that forms a new habit. Good or bad? That\'s subjective!!!

Rozlynn van der Vyver scoured newspapers for job offers for weeks before she found a job at a local chain store. But when she turned up, she was kidnapped. Hours later, she woke up on the side of a road many miles away. Critically injured she managed to tell her friend she\'d been raped and viciously beaten by four men. The men who murdered Roz have never been brought to justice. Somebody out there still knows something.

In 2005 the popular tourist town of Knysna was shattered when the bodies of two young women and a man were found. Jessica Wheeler and Victoria Stadler were both last seen leaving a popular nightclub in town.  A popular DJ, Heinrich van Rooyen was suspected of the murders as he was witnessed on both occasions leaving the club with the girls. His DNA sample also matched samples taken from the victims.

Cape Town, 2003. A young man stumbles into a filling station, bleeding profusely and covered in sticky tape. He tells the attendant about a massacre and collapses in a heap on the floor. By the time the police get to Sizzlers Gay Escort Agency, it is too late. Nine men are found dead. Two months later two men are arrested. Adam Woest and Trevor Theys are tried and convicted on nine counts of murder and one of attempted murder.

Dina Rodriguez comes from a middle class white South African family. A product of Wynberg Girls High School, it was ironic that years later she would be in the court just over the road from her High School for doing the unthinkable. In 2005, Dina began her affair with Neil Wilson; he hid the fact that he had a love child and when Dina found out she went into a murderous rage. She paid hit men to “make the problem go away”.

This fly-on-the-wall documentary follows the story of three extraordinary men who fight crime using extremely unorthodox methods. This fascinating film follows them as they use their inventive minds to create the ultimate crime-fighting team. Known as ‘the Mountain Men,\' they’re loved by the public, but hated by criminals!

When her sister Leigh vanishes without a trace, Emma uncovers a labyrinth of secrets, lies, and online deception. In Finding Leigh: A Tangled Web, every clue reveals a darker conspiracy as Emma races to find the truth. A gripping thriller about the dangerous underbelly of digital life.

name: A Crime Of Hate: Funeka\'s Story

info.plot: Set in Cape Town, South Africa, the film centres on an extraordinary black lesbian activist called Funeka Soldaat. Through her, we are able to get to the heart of a chilling phenomenon known as “corrective” or “curative” rape that is sweeping across South Africa. As its name suggests, it is a form of punishment that is being meted out to black lesbian women in a bid to “correct” their sexuality. In its most brutal form, victims are raped and then murdered.

Cult Ozploitation film from the early 1980’s depicts a concentration camp in a totalitarian society which allows rich adventurers to participate in human hunting games, no coincidence the prison camp warden is named Thatcher. Stars Olivia Hussey
Based on true events, when an illegal immigrant crosses to the United States only to meet his worst nightmare, a determined sexual predator U.S. Border Agent.
A gritty award winning one-shot drama set in a single afternoon where a man comes to grips with the power of his past when his estranged family becomes tangled in its web.

In January 1879, arrogant officials of the British colony of Natal, Africa issued a list of unauthorized ultimatums to the Zulu Nation. When the Zulu King refused their demands, the Empire declared war. And in a series of grave tactical blunders, a garrison of 1,500 British soldiers faced an army of 25,000 enraged Zulu warriors in the most horrifying disaster in British military history.

Screen legends Richard Burton, Roger Moore and Richard Harris star as a team of aging mercenaries hired by a wealthy industrialist for one final mission: Recruit and train a squad of desperate commandos, parachute into an unstable African nation, snatch its deposed President from a maximum security army prison, escape via the military-controlled airport, and massacre anyone who gets in their way.

The Only Way is one of the great heroic episodes of World War II. The story of the people of Denmark who save the Danish Jews from the Nazis. A true story of one of the greatest escapes in World War II.

Two brothers. One city. A fight to survive. Sons of New Orleans follows their journey through violence, loyalty, and the dream of something better—set against the backdrop of America’s most dangerous streets. Raw, real, and impossible to ignore.

A wild, provocative thriller from Álex de la Iglesia where sociopath priestess Perdita Durango (Rosie Perez) and her lover (Javier Bardem) embark on a crime-fueled journey across the border. Featuring santería rituals, kidnapping, and a determined DEA agent (James Gandolfini).
A cursed survivor of killings at the Amityville House brings evil to a small island where bizarre genetic experiments are carried out on humans and animals in a secret women’s prison.
Roxy, a young stripper, becomes the murderous object of a deranged customer and slowly descends into darkness until she decides to strike back.

Several young girls have gone missing in a quiet, peaceful town  - and both the police and the families of the victims are at a loss for any answers. Meanwhile, the unassuming Walter Banner is renting out his second home to a trio of young college girls for a party. But they have no idea they are the latest in a long line of prey to Walter’s deep-rooted insanity, bloodlust and mommy issues.

On a peaceful October day a college team and their coaches depart on a three day journey to a national championship. From the start, strange things happen on their creaky, rented bus. Just after midnight on the third day, they hit something on the road. For the next six hours, in the dead of night, thirteen people face their ultimate terror.

Alex, a troubled young man is thrust into a dark underworld when he becomes a pawn in a brutal struggle between two drug lords for a new street drug called Loco. Alex’s only hope comes from a beautiful girl, Lydia, who is also caught up in the scheme, and together they try to escape their dangerous world. A shocking surprise awaits them because nothing is what it seems to be in the world of Loco.
A group of paranormal investigators in the UK come face to face with the American legend Bigfoot and must fight for their lives while trying to capture proof of the creature’s existence.

A cautionary scientists-shouldn’t-try-to-play-God sci-fi thriller. It strives for scientific accuracy, uncomfortable at times with a sinister undertow with an unexpected cliffhanger. Barbara Carrera has a memorable nude scene. Also staring Rock Hudson and Diane Ladd.

In an alternate timeline with the failed assassination of President John F. Kennedy an amoral boy (Don Johnson) and his telepathic dog, Blood work together as a team to survive the post-apocalyptic world war IV.
One of the best of the worst films of all time. When viewed with the right mindset it never fails to entertain, many say a Misunderstood masterpiece.

Glenn Ford and David Soul star in this gripping sci-fi thriller when a military flight encounters something extraordinary. Based on rumored real events that the government wanted buried - watch this conspiracy classic free.

Synopsis: It’s London, 1892 and Defendant 47 is on trial. His judge and lawyers are asking him questions that he apparently cannot answer. He only can remember a few details, where he’s been lately and glimpses of the past. Defendant 47 slowly starts remembering that his name is Charles Dee and he’s mathematician who runs a photography studio. He now remembers that his preferred subject were children. Through them, he met Ellen Rhodes, the one who will only bring him to a dark end.

After inheriting her grandmother’s old house, Danielle stumbles upon a chilling secret that has been hidden away for decades. As she delves deeper into the shadows of the house, she uncovers a mysterious presence tied to her family’s past. This discovery threatens not just her safety, but also the very fabric of her reality. Caught between uncovering the truth and preserving her sanity, Danielle must navigate the dark corridors of history to unravel the mystery before it consumes her.

After finding a time machine, a young man’s life spirals into chaos. Faced with tragedy, he must test his new powers in ways he never imagined. Time Jumpers delivers a thrilling ride through time, choices, and consequences.
A man is is transported into a virtual-matrix computer game and tasked with solving a seemingly implausible murder.
With Mob, FBI and Terrorists chasing, Nereus and Keith must weave through a world of madness and get to Old Mexico where Nereus can find the Answers to his Past.
A man\'s attempts to construct the ultimate romantic weekend backfire when his quest for perfection traps his lover in an infinite time loop.

Hoyle, a girl with a sharp mind and a weakness for bourbon, finds herself on the trail of a reclusive genius. But her work takes a series of unforeseen twists as events around her grow increasingly fragmented... disconnected... surreal. With a sexy lounge singer and a loyal partner as her only allies, Hoyle is plunged into a dark world of intrigue and earth-shattering cosmological secrets.

When their parents are brutally murdered by bandits, two young girls, Matti and Joslyn are left completely alone in a world destroyed by the financial meltdown. With the weight of responsibility on her shoulders, a shotgun in hand, and only 5 shells to protect them. Matti decides they must go find the only relative they know of, their grandmother, whom they have never actually met.

Arkham, 1975: Jonathan Davis\' father has disappeared. His tracks lead to Germany, to the Swabian-Franconian Forest where he was stationed after the Second World War. Jonathan sets out to find him and bring him home, but deep in the woods he discovers a dark mystery from the past. Based on H.P. Lovecraft\'s short novel \"The Color Out of Space\".

Jessie Gravers\' mother Sara will fall into a coma when a live electrical cable falls into the pool. She\'s taken off life support, and eight years later, while going through some of her old things, she finds that old phone, never used, and on a whim calls her old home phone number. A little girl answers, and she and Jessie seem to have a lot in common.

name: Reigo: King Of The Sea Monsters

info.plot: The powerful battleship Yamato, while on patrol in the Pacific, cross paths with the massive kaiju Reigo, the deep-sea monster! The stage is set for an epic battle to between the worlds largest battleship and the mysterious dragon-like monster - with the fate of humankind hanging in the balance.

A classroom experiment backfires, transforming mild-mannered Mr. Wilson into a 50-foot colossus! As the giant teacher wreaks havoc across town, his clever students must find a cure before the military takes drastic action. This family comedy delivers big laughs and even bigger adventures.

A deadly virus spreads globally after a shark bite. Deep underwater, researchers frantically work on a cure while infected lab technicians turn violent. The team must escape to the surface with the antidote, battling both their infected colleagues and predatory sharks inside the lab and the ocean.

name: Max Reload and the Nether Blasters

info.plot: A small town video game store clerk must go from zero to hero after accidentally unleashing the forces of evil from a cursed Colecovision© video game cartridge.

A comedic Sci-Fi/Horror film set in San Antonio, inspired by classic B-movies. A group of friends prepare to go to a dance. During the dance, a strange alien substance is introduced and infects several people turning them into alien zombies. Unsurprisingly, all hell breaks loose! Lowriders must survive the vicious attack of these alien zombies using their only resources: their pimped-out cars!

After becoming injected with a formula derived from an alien ship, a lab gorilla escapes from his containment and befriends two young boys.  The alien formula causes the gorilla to grow to gargantuan size and rampage throughout the city and the boys must find a way to save their simian friend before the army takes him down.

A unit of mercenaries must team up with a group of tech-geek students after America is struck with an EMP attack. Deep in the desert, they find the source of the terror, a mad scientist who has also just created a living dead T-Rex dinosaur, one who turns everyone it attacks into a zombie. Now they must scramble to stay alive and save the planet from the ultimate undead predator.

A man wakes up on a bench without any idea who he is until he is shot dead by four masked assassins. The man wakes on the same bench thinking his death was a dream until the assassins return and despite his attempts to escape, they kill him again. Stuck in this hellish loop, he tries to unravel the mystery and with each death he gets closer to the truth.
A train-wreck time traveler gives a depressed barista a second shot at life—with one weird catch. Future is a twisted, time-hopping tale of regret and redemption.

A Retro Release! Set in the dark depths of a strictly controlled universe, enter the world of a lonely maintenance worker named ELLIOT who struggles to discover his true identity only to fall down a hellish rabbit hole of self disgust and harsh inner truths.

This two disc set traces the history of Eminem’s career by way of, firstly a DVD documentary covering his rise to the top, and a second disc overflowing with video interviews with the man himself taken from across his career to date. Completed in 6-panel digi-packaging this superb set will delight fans of Eminem and his dynamic sound everywhere and anywhere across the planet.

name: The Gypsy Kings: Kings of the World

info.plot: This poetic documentary offers an intimate glimpse into the gypsy community in the south of France. While this community has produced world renowned musicians very little is known about them. This film follows three families-the Reyes, the Balliardo and the Regis, and explores the connections they have to flamenco. Featuring over 20 stunning preformances, this is a must watch for anyone interested in flamenco music.

Moment to Moment is an in depth exploration The Gloaming, the Irish band that Peter Gabriel described as having \"inventing a new genre.\" Bringing unparalled energy to their craft, Martin Hayes, Iarla Ó Lionáird, Caoimhin Ó Rhallghaich, Dennis Cahill and Thomas Bartlett have reinterpretated irish traditional music and transformed it into something new. Acclaimed across the globe, this documentary follows the band working on new material in Wicklow\'s Grouse Lodge Studio.

The ultimate concert took place on Memorial Day Weekend 1983. Curated by Steve Wozniak (Apple computers), the 3 days of New Wave, Heavy Metal and Rock are legendary. Features performances from U2, the Clash, Judas Priest, Stevie Nicks, Scorpions, INXS, Men at Work, Stray Cats, Triumph, Missing Persons and more

Until The Light Takes Us tells the story of black metal. Part music scene and part cultural uprising, black metal rose to worldwide notoriety in the mid-nineties when a rash of suicides, murders, and church burnings accompanied the explosive artistic growth and output of a music scene that would forever redefine what heavy metal is and what it stands for.

This film is a documentary review which traces the band and their music back to their inception in the late 1980s, and follows their story and sound through to the present day. Featuring rare and classic Tool performances, archive footage, exclusive interviews, contributions from their closest colleagues and friends, review and critique from the finest writers of the underground rock press, seldom seen photography, location shoots and a host of other features.

From his debut album to his final days, Stevie Ray Vaughan – Lonestar tells the untold story of a blues icon’s most powerful years. Witness the rise, the struggle, and the soul of a guitar legend who redefined a genre and left a lasting legacy.

name: Stevie Ray Vaughan - Rise Of A Texas Bluesman: 1954-1983

info.plot: This film reveals and dissects the formative years of Stevie Ray Vaughan\'s career - his influences and his first recordings - and traces the history of Texas blues itself, identifying Vaughan\'s place within this larger tradition. Featuring rare archive footage, exclusive interviews and a host of other features which all at once provide the finest document on the celebrated guitarist yet to emerge.

name: Duane Allman - Song Of The South: Duane Allman And The Rise Of The Allman Brothers

info.plot: Duane Allman, the lead guitarist and driving force behind Southern Rock pioneers The Allman Brothers Band, lived a tragically short life, but during his brief career he changed music forever. With contributions from an illustrious and highly knowledgeable cast of friends, insiders and experts, plus rare footage and exclusive interviews, this film looks at Duane\'s life, work and musical output.

name: Sad Vacation: The Last Days Of Sid And Nancy

info.plot: Sad Vacation is a personal account of the tumultuous and stormy relationship between Sid Vicious and Nancy Spungen and how it ended in Room 100 of the Chelsea Hotel. Directed by Danny Garcia, this films pulls no punches and reveals the facts through personal friends, insiders and witnesses. Includes interviews with Sylvain Sylvain, Bob Gruen, Walter Lure, Leee Black Childers, and many more.

This film traces the complete history of the hugely influential rockers, Rush. Through a stunning combination of rare and classic footage, the testimony of friends, colleagues and those who worked with the group across the years, plus exclusive and archive interviews and a host of other features, this programme makes the very unique story of Rush come alive in a manner previously undocumented.

name: Rolling Stone: Life And Death Of Brian Jones

info.plot: Rolling Stone: Life and Death of Brian Jones is the new documentary from acclaimed filmmaker Danny Garcia. Exploring the rise of Brian Jones and the Rolling Stones as well as the untimely death of Jones, Garcia paints an interesting and revealing picture of doomed pop star.

name: Queen - Under Review 1946-1991: The Freddie Mercury Story

info.plot: This documentary includes historical musical performances re-assessed by a panel of esteemed experts, as well as obscure footage, rare interviews and rarely seen photographs.

In the mid-90s, Prince didn’t just make headlines—he made history. Prince: Slave Trade explores his bold fight against the music industry, his battle for control, and how he became one of the shrewdest minds in showbiz. A must-watch for true music fans.

name: Stevie Nicks - Through The Looking Glass

info.plot: For over four decades Stevie Nicks has been responsible for composing some of the best loved and most joyous contemporary songs ever written, as this documentary film recounts. Featuring rare footage, archive and new interviews, plus contributions from those who have worked closely with Stevie such as good friend Keith Olsen, Rumours producer Ken Caillat, and Rick Vito, this DVD will delight fans.

name: Mean Man: The Story Of Chris Holmes

info.plot: Once a metal icon, Chris Holmes lost it all—his rights, his health, and his fame. Now he’s rebuilding from scratch in Cannes, chasing one last shot at redemption. Mean Man is a wild ride through the highs, lows, and raw truth of rock ’n’ roll survival.

name: Lynyrd Skynyrd - Gone With The Wind

info.plot: This film revisits the story of Lynyrd Skynyrd in a manner previously unattempted. Using a mixture of new and archive interviews, contributions from band members and those closest to the group, location shoots, news reports and a fascinating first-hand description of the fateful 1977 plane crash, this program is set to become the standard documentary work on this legendary band.

name: Led Zeppelin - Physical Graffiti: A Classic Album Under Review

info.plot: Go behind the scenes of Led Zeppelin’s most iconic album. Featuring rare footage, interviews, and expert insight, this doc dives deep into the music, making, and legacy of a rock masterpiece.

name: Lynyrd Skynyrd - I\'ll Never Forget You: The Last 72 Hours Of Lynyrd Skynyrd

info.plot: I\'ll Never Forget You: The Last 72 Hours of Lynyrd Skynyrd chronicles the story of three survivors: security guard Gene Odom, lead backup singer Leslie Hawkins and guitar tech Craig Reed. These survivors give their firsthand accounts of the wild times of the band, the 72 hours leading to the crash, the harrowing crash itself and its aftermath. Based on Gene Odom\'s book, I\'ll Never Forget You.

name: Get Thrashed! The Story Of Thrash Metal

info.plot: Featuring the biggest bands in heavy metal music, Get Thrashed! covers the origins, cultural impact, and musical influence of Thrash Metal. Told first-hand by the members of bands like Metallica, Slayer, and Anthrax, as well as using raw, original show footage.  Along the way we witness the drugs, drinking, fighting, deaths, mosh pits,  long hair and most of all - the groundbreaking new music.

name: Frank Zappa - Summer ’82: When Zappa Came To Sicily

info.plot: In the feature documentary, Summer 82 - When Zappa Came to Sicily, filmmaker and Zappa fan Salvo Cuccia tells the behind-the-scenes story of Frank Zappa’s star-crossed concert in Palermo, Sicily, the wrap-up to a European tour that ended in public disturbances and police intervention. Cuccia had a ticket to the concert but never made it.

name: Crosby, Stills, Nash & Young - Fifty By Four

info.plot: This is CSNY\'s story, a journey of breakthroughs, breakdowns, break-ups and incredible music. Featuring exclusive interviews, seldom-seen footage, classic and rare performances, and contributions from those who worked closely with CSNY across the years - including Dallas Taylor, Greg Reeves, Danny Kortchmar, Joe Lala, Chad Cromwell, Joe Vitale, The Albert Brothers, Bill Halverson plus many others.
Dive into Clapton’s epic 1970s journey with rare performances, insider interviews, and rock legends telling the story. Eric Clapton – The 1970s Review is must-see music history

name: Bobby Keys - Every Night\'s A Saturday Night: The Bobby Keys Story

info.plot: Bobby Keys mark on the music industry and his soulfully brash and bellowing sax solos will be heard until the end of time.

A disgraced Confederate Colonel who has deserted, flees to the Everglades where he encounters a disparate group of four other Southern deserters. Together they struggle to find their way out of the swamp and resolve their personal demons watched by hostile Seminoles as theybattle to survive.

Based on the true story starring Randolph Scott stars as James Barlow, a special agent sent west to infiltrate and break up the four outlaws that was renowned for train robberies, the Reno brothers gang. Starring Randolph Scott, Forrest Tucker, Mala Powers and J. Carrol Naish.

Patricia Medina stars as Angela Medley a gambler entangled with an outlaw while still in love with a frontier doctor. A story of Angela’s struggle for redemption amid personal turmoil, with Henry Hull in a notable role as her father.

Stellar cast andefore it’s time with an illigitement pregnancy story line. Two vengeful brothers seeking the responsible father. Scene photography is impeccable and tight runtime. Starring Burt Lancaster and Robert Walker

Excellent historical western involving the U.S. cavalry from West Point to fighting in Kansas in the 1850’s, Starring the magnetic Errol Flynn and Olivia De Havilland pairing and co-starring a an ex-president.

When a bank heist goes wrong ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman’s son, tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through dangerous Indian territory. Sam Peckinpah directed starring Maureen O’Hara and Brain Keith.
A fine well-made classic Western with a stunning Arizona backdrop. Gunman John Wayne falls for a Quaker girl  convincingly played by Gail Russell, but inevitably his dark past catches up with him.
Hoppy goes undercover as a gambler from the East when Bar 20 cattle are stolen by unknown rustlers. Brennan/Talbot are twin brothers (one a casino owner, the other a rancher) and Hoppy ...
Hoppy goes to town to help Marshal Windy with some rustlers and winds up helping the widow Joyce when confidence men try to take her herd.
Hoppy and Lucky are headed to South America to deliver a herd of cattle. Bad guy Ralph Merritt gets in their way. For a while.
Buck Colins heads a group of local ranchers who are trying to prevent the railroad from completing its line through their property. Till now they have been able to charge tolls on herds ...

When a farmer’s wife is brutally murdered by the ruthless bandit Bobby Durango and his gang of killers, Billy Rogers goes back to his old gun and starts to hunt them one by one. This is a Grindhouse style Spaghetti Western shot and made to look like the classic European Westerns of the 1960s and 1970s - true to the form of how they were filmed in the late 1960s.

John Warner is a rebel soldier who deserts his outfit on the eve of battle and goes over the border into Mexico to be with his girlfriend when she gives birth to their child. When he arrives Warner finds that his fiancée has died in childbirth and her father, played by Ernest Borgnine, lusts only to kill him.

Joel McCrea portrays a circuit judge, who comes to a small western and finds it under the feudal thumb of an old-line family.  Despite wholehearted opposition and obstacles, he smokes out the necessary frightened witnesses and defies the whole clan by seeing that justice is done.   Filmed among the red rocks of scenic Sedona, Arizona.

“Silver Lode” is a 1954 Western that follows Dan Ballard, a respected citizen accused of murder on his wedding day. As the town turns against him, Ballard must prove his innocence while evading a corrupt marshal. The film serves as an allegory for McCarthyism.

In Apache Rifles, Audie Murphy stars as a battle-hardened cavalry leader whose heart—and loyalties—are tested by love, greed, and war on the frontier. A classic Western where courage and conscience collide on the wild edge of the American West.

When a farmer’s wife is brutally murdered by the ruthless bandit Bobby Durango and his gang of killers, Billy Rogers goes back to his old gun and starts to hunt them one by one. This is a Grindhouse style Spaghetti Western shot and made to look like the classic European Westerns of the 1960s and 1970s - true to the form of how they were filmed in the late 1960s.

When Santa’s elves oversleep and toy production falls hopelessly behind, frazzled elf Mitzi turns to Miss Whatnot for a “pick‑me‑up” that only makes things worse. With Christmas on the line, the North Pole scrambles in a frantic race against time to save the big night.

name: Snowballs Christmas Tales by the Fire

info.plot: Snowball the Christmas Puppy and his furry friend narrate classic holiday tales by a crackling fire. Snowball’s Christmas Tails By The Fire is sure to entertain the whole family and create beautiful holiday memories for years to come.

Christmas is approaching, and best friends Harry, Jordan, Ben, and Dennis are at their annual get together before the holidays. As they share stories of their past year, it is clear they all still have a lot of growing to do. But everything turns into total chaos when Ben loses custody of his son and decides kidnapping is the only way to save his family. Now these friends must come together and do the right thing, proving family and friendship is what is most important.

name: Christmas Eve: Panic at the Pole

info.plot: A Christmas Musical - A frantic musical comedy reveals the chaos at Santa’s North Pole workshop on Christmas Eve, as elves scramble, reindeer run wild, and a burned-out Santa nearly calls it quits before holiday magic saves the night.

name: The Grump Who Stole Christmas: Naughty vs. Nice

info.plot: When a wicked Grump and his robot sidekick Clank cast a spell that lets eager Larry the Reindeer swap places with Santa. Now this clueless but big-hearted reindeer must save the holiday before the magic – and the presents – disappear for good. Naughty vs. Nice - The battle is on.

name: Christmas Mountain -- The Story Of A Cowboy Angel

info.plot: Holiday movies suitable for all ages generally feature uplifting, inclusive stories that celebrate the spirit of the season, family togetherness, kindness, and magical moments. These films often avoid intense or mature themes, focusing instead on themes like friendship, giving, and forgiveness.

When their recently separated parents each plan a solo holiday, two determined kids secretly arrange for everyone to “accidentally” spend Christmas together at the family beach house, hoping snow, sand, and a little holiday magic will rekindle their parents’ love.

A recently divorced woman loses almost everything and finds herself suddenly homeless. As Christmas approaches, she rebuilds her life from the ground up, discovers unexpected friendship and love, and fights to create a real home again in time for the holidays.

A big-city star columnist and a small-town advice writer clash when their newspapers become rivals at Christmas. As their dueling holiday columns battle for readers and careers, sparks fly and a war of words slowly turns into an unexpected holiday romance.

A fashion-obsessed teen would rather hit the slopes than spend Christmas with her family, until she gives a mall Santa an extreme makeover and gets whisked along on his Christmas Eve ride, discovering the true meaning of family, giving, and holiday spirit.

A struggling single mom working as a limo driver gets stuck escorting an eccentric millionaire on Christmas Eve as he hands out money to strangers, drawing media attention and uncovering a surprising family connection that changes all their lives.

name: Christmas Mountain - The Story Of A Cowboy Angel

info.plot: A heartwarming Christmas tale starring American protagonist Mark Miller, writer, producer and star of Savannah Smiles, and his boisterous comic book companion, eternally lovable, Slim Pickens.

A contemporary adaptation of Dickens’ classic, featuring Laurence Foster as Charles Dickens. This modest-budget, color film uses narration and shadowy visuals to capture the original’s somber, ghostly tone, and was released by MVD with a cast of Irish and English actors.

When Santa’s elves oversleep and toy production falls hopelessly behind, frazzled elf Mitzi turns to Miss Whatnot for a “pick‑me‑up” that only makes things worse. With Christmas on the line, the North Pole scrambles in a frantic race against time to save the big night.

A Foundation reporter, Isidor Dukas comes to the Institute to make a report. For the purpose of objective reporting, the Foundation uses agents with induced, synthetic identities. In confrontation with one of the test subjects, what was supposed to be a routine control turns into a never ending maze.

name: Je Criais Contre La Vie Ou Pour Elle

info.plot: In the forest, the herd of deer turns against the hound dogs that have been chasing them so far. From this unusual chase, new landscapes arise from the ground. This collage drama was made after an idea from a 19th century engraving.
When an evil monster known as Nian rises in the heart of China, it’s up to the chosen twelve to stop it.  When the Kung Fu Rooster calls you better be ready!

Join the delicious adventure in The Salted Egg 2 as our eggy hero returns with new friends for a cracking good time! When their kitchen kingdom faces a mysterious threat, this plucky egg must scramble into action. Perfect family fun filled with humor, heart, and egg-cellent animation.

The Brainy Bubbly Bug Buddies are back! It\'s time to buzz into a spectacular insect-adventure with a bug\'s-eye view of the habits and habitats of actual insects. Learn incredible facts about some amazing little creatures that will fascinate and inspire kids.

Two chickens journey to the Salted Egg Temple, a martial arts town where they struggle with Kung-Fu training. When evil weasels threaten their new home, they find friendship and courage, joining the town in a spirited battle to protect their way of life.

Pondemonium presents Buzzed 3 a animated comedy starring all your favorite microscopic pals! Come out down to the pond and hang out with Joe Croaker, the silliest frog around. Explore the swamp and all the fun bugs that live in it, it’s Buzzed 3.

Pondemonium presents Zap a fun-filled comedy from the producers of Boonie Bears. When bees hang out in the swamp, everything goes to the frogs. These critters just can’t seem to get along. But a little love goes a long way as this bee learns and when you are filled with love anything is possible.

All your favorite pond critters are back for another grand adventure. As Joe continues to wreak havoc on the pond, Bartle Bee and Cosmo get up to their own shenanigans. One thing is for sure, a day in pondemonium is never dull. But as Bartle Bee and Cosmo come to learn, the most important thing is f

name: The Grump Who Stole Christmas: Naughty vs. Nice

info.plot: When a wicked Grump and his robot sidekick Clank cast a spell that lets eager Larry the Reindeer swap places with Santa. Now this clueless but big-hearted reindeer must save the holiday before the magic – and the presents – disappear for good. Naughty vs. Nice - The battle is on.

At Christmas, dung beetle Mcbroom attempts to play Santa at the marsh, giving dung balls as gifts. When Bartle Bee and Flyby aren’t impressed, Mcbroom realizes he must learn about proper gift-giving to create a memorable holiday for all the pond creatures.

name: StrAngel: The Angel of The Odd

info.plot: Edgar a true bachelor, who devoted himself to the compulsive logic of reason and the categorical imperative, not only denies the existence of coincidences and stroke of fate, he also despises those to which the inexplicable happens. True to his motto: \'Every man forges his own destiny,\' EDGAR sees bad luck as something of others. But fate (in the form of truly strange angel) is sending him on an odd path of reformation.

Welcome to Pixy Dragon Town. An amazing place where magical, fire-spewing dragons live in peace and happiness… Most of the time! DRACO and GRUS are the town’s troublemakers. When they set their sights on winning the town’s fire-spewing contest, they travel to an ancient castle to seek the help of a ferocious fire-breathing dragon known as LACERTA.

name: Beartales: The Adventures of Sammy Jay

info.plot: When Papa Bear and Baby bear jump in their magical airship for a one of a kind adventure, they tell classic bedtime fairytale stories along the way.

name: Bee Geniuses: The Life of Bees

info.plot: Some bees live to make honey, but these young bees live to learn! Fly along through the forest with Zip and Zap, as they quench their insatiable thirst for knowledge, with the help of the smartest bee they know: Queen Buttercup! No topic is too sticky, and no answer escapes their curiosity! Have you ever wanted to learn all about everything there is to know? Then, join Bee Geniuses Zip and Zap for a fun educational experience for kids of all ages!

The Brainy Bubbly Bug Buddies are back! It’s time to buzz into a spectacular insect-adventure with a bug’s-eye view of the habits and habitats of actual insects. Learn incredible facts about some amazing little creatures that will fascinate and inspire kids. These bugs are ready to learn and have fun. Join the Brainy Bubbly Bug Buddies for an animated learning experience.

name: Brainy Bubbly Bug Buddies 4: Best Bug Buddies

info.plot: Join the Best Bug Buddies for a bug-tastic adventure. Get a bug’s-eye view of the habits and habitats of actual insects. Learn incredible facts from some amazing little creatures that will fascinate and inspire.  Jump into the lake with the Best Bug Buddies!
This is the story of three German girls who are all fanatical about boards - living their lives skateboarding and surfing the ocean waves on a trip to Cape Town
The Mother - Portraits of the human experience. All bound together by water
Warrior - Portraits of the human experience. All bound together by water
The Nomad - Portraits of the human experience. All bound together by water
Elder - Follow Rob Elliott who has guided more than 200 trips on the Grand Canyon of the Colorado River and is known as the Elder

Two soldiers from different sides are unified by their faith and shared humanity. During this unexpected and life changing encounter at the Battle of Belleau Wood in 1918, the men must choose between their country and their beliefs.
The dangerous travel makes the teenager to understand life as an adult and determines his way.

One night, as Nour restrains herself from throwing to the bulky waste her old bed, she finds buried in her mattress a picture bearing the promise of a forebear. This discovery propels this young woman overflowing with desire and her bed in the streets of the city. Le Lit is a generous and gently quirky short film about the city and the poetic ride of a young woman filled with desire.

In one Paris divided militarily into two like was the former Berlin Est-Ouest, Ines Raymond receives from the right bank people who ask for a visa for the left bank. Each have their reasons and dreams for crossing the Seine, but, Ines must follow the new instructions.
Getting plastered with the art world’s most unconventional plastic surgeon.

Naïve man-child Johnny stumbles upon an anonymous box on his quiet Brooklyn street. Panicky residents gather to investigate. What’s in it, and who left it? Good-natured Steve struggles to be the voice of reason as and speculation turns to accusation. Prejudice and crackpot theories turn neighbor against neighbor. Is Johnny’s far-fetched story about the box correct, or is there an even more fiendish plot behind it all?

Everybody Knows is a dramedy that narrates the story of Howie Rivers; a small-town musician that, after trying hard to succeed in Los Angeles, goes home to face the expectations, fears and that double mortification product of having to justify himself before his people for such failure
Edith’ explores how we move on from bereavements. How we make peace with our past and find something worth living for.
Thriller short film about an astronaut battling PTSD.
A young woman comes to terms with the future that lies ahead of her on the eve of her senior year of college.

Farid, 12 years old, is an enigma to others. Quiet and original, he seems to be experiencing daily life without feeling any emotion. However, one day, against all expectations, he will change thanks to an improbable musical instrument.

Oscar Mongoût, a gourmet cannibal, burns with love for a neighbor in his building, the very vegetal Miss Carrot. But this passion seems destined to fail: she is vegetarian, while he has a severe case of vegetable phobia. Things take a drastic turn the evening she invites him to dinner.
A young girl wakes up one morning to find that she has turned completely blue.

Friday, 11:00 p.m. Carla, a woman of about forty, is alone in her office. She gets a call, it’s Raúl, a young guy who passes her cocaine. They’ve known each other for some years, but they’ve never exchanged more than two consecutive sentences. Tonight will be the last night that Raúl works as a dealer. He wants to change his life. He’s going to Australia, to work as a gardener.

After sinking into a deep depression, riddled with writer’s block and frustration, a comic creator is visited by his own caped creation: Ultra-Girl. Will she be able to inspire the man who made her? Or is this the end for both of them?
George Watson wants to re-live his life, do the things he misses doing, avoid the mistakes he made before and take new opportunities.

While visiting his aunt Liisa in the Estonian island of Saaremaa, youngster Martin sees no reason to look away from his cellphone screen. In the attempt to entertain the boy, Liisa drives him to Kaali, an ancient, legendary meteor crater.
Set in 1990’s England, Daniel is an 8 year old boy who dreams of being an Ice Cream Man. Daniel takes us on a short journey of what it is to be an Ice Cream Man and how he will one day be one.
Dealing with the loss of his girlfriend, a man’s grief takes form through the activation of his electronics.

One Step Beyond” is a half-hour supernatural anthology series hosted by John Newland, presenting eerie, stand‑alone stories inspired by allegedly real incidents of psychic phenomena, ghosts, premonitions, and other unexplained events. Set up as docudrama-style reenactments rather than traditional fantasy, the show leans into atmospheric, grounded storytelling that blurs the line between fact and folklore.

In 17th‑century Scotland, an old curse warns that the eldest son of a proud noble family will always die first. When the current heir survives war and illness against all odds, the clan believes the spell is broken—until a chain of eerie coincidences suggests fate is closing in. (S2/E4)

A hard‑drinking businessman gets a second chance at life after a near‑fatal accident, then is sent to survey a Nevada mine. When a cave‑in traps a young girl underground, his fight to save her becomes a test of courage, faith, and whether destiny is offering him true redemption.  (S1/E6)

episodes.name: One Step Beyond:  The Burning Girl

info.plot: A shy teenage outcast becomes the target of fear and suspicion when mysterious fires break out wherever she goes. Branded a “burning girl” by her small town, she struggles to prove she isn’t an arsonist as terrifying evidence suggests she may control fire with her mind. (S1/E16)

episodes.name: One Step Beyond:  Image of Death

info.plot: In a French chateau, a vain nobleman murders his lover and smugly conceals the crime, certain the law can’t touch him. Soon, a strange stain appears on a wall and slowly forms her face, driving him into paranoia as the “image of death” seems determined to reveal what he’s done. (S1/E18)

A man with a rare blood type refuses to donate to a stranger, convinced that everyone who receives his blood is doomed to die. When a gas explosion traps a young woman and only his blood can save her, his terrifying premonitions collide with a life‑or‑death moral choice.  (S2/E1)

episodes.name: One Step Beyond: The Haunted U-Boat

info.plot: A German U‑boat crew in World War II is terrorized by relentless metallic pounding that no sonar or search can explain. As fear spreads and the sub’s luck turns deadly, the captain must face the possibility that a wronged worker’s ghost has come aboard to exact revenge from below.  (S1/E17)

A damaged U.S. Navy ship drifts in enemy waters with its captain near death and no doctor aboard. As a shaken pharmacist’s mate attempts a desperate operation guided only by a distant radio surgeon, strange forces—and a dead brother’s memory—seem to steady his hands in the operating room. (S2/E3)

A skeptical man has his fortune told at a cocktail party. As events begin to unfold exactly as the psychic has predicted, his disbelief turns to fear of the psychic’s final prediction... will also come to pass (S1 E3)

A bellboy in San Francisco keeps telling everyone that there’s going to be an earthquake but no one’s willing to listen to him, they know he’s a recovering alcoholic so they assume....  Needless to say, it’s far easier to fire someone than to listen to their insane rambling - right?  S2/E17

episodes.name: One Step Beyond: The Captain’s Guests

info.plot: A tense couple rents an isolated seaside cottage once owned by a long-dead sea captain, only to encounter eerie knocks, moving objects, and a possessive presence that seems obsessed with the wife. As jealousy flares, the invisible “host” may be steering them toward a deadly ending.  (S1/E19)

A man acquitted of killing his wife retreats to a secluded country house, only to be tormented by visions and sounds that replay the murder he insists he didn’t commit. When a relative from New Zealand arrives with shocking information, the haunting “echo” points to the real killer.  (S1/E20)

episodes.name: One Step Beyond: The Devil’s Laughter

info.plot: A convicted killer cheats the hangman when the noose mysteriously fails again and again, forcing officials to commute his sentence. Freed but marked by the gallows, he begins to sense when and how he truly will die—while an eerie, mocking laughter seems to follow his every step. (S1/E11)

episodes.name: One Step Beyond: Night of April 14

info.plot: A young bride-to-be is tormented by recurring nightmares of drowning at sea, only to learn her husband has secretly booked their honeymoon on the Titanic. As their voyage begins, chilling premonitions and eerie coincidences suggest a doomed fate she cannot escape. (S01 /E02)

episodes.name: One Step Beyond: Anniversary of a Murder

info.plot: A respectable businessman hides a deadly hit‑and‑run he committed years earlier, but on the accident’s anniversary strange voices and a phantom recording begin to torment him. As the evidence he buried resurfaces in impossible ways, it seems the victim is reaching back for justice. (S2/E63)

On the eve of World War II, a jealous rival sabotages a glider flight, sending a young pilot to a seemingly certain death. Years later, former club members are drawn to a mysterious reunion, where a returning aircraft and grim evidence expose the long-buried truth of murder and revenge. (S2/E10)

episodes.name: One Step Beyond: Make Me Not A Witch

info.plot: In a rural village, a young girl with uncanny mind‑reading abilities is branded a witch by fearful neighbors and even her own parents. As a compassionate priest investigates her “gift,” the line between miracle and curse blurs, and mob hysteria threatens to turn superstition into tragedy. (S2/E14)

episodes.name: One Step Beyond:  Where Are They

info.plot: Unique episode about two mysterious people causing inexplicable events. The first has rocks falling from the sky on a town, in full view including newspapermen. The second, a mysterious man approaches a government official and demonstrates how he created a pellet that turns water into gas. S3E12

After the death of his father young lawyer Dan (Jack Lord) discovers that he bought an old vaudeville theatre which has been shut down for many years. Suffice to say he learns more about his father than he expected in a very unexpected way. S2 E13

One snowy night alcoholic Ellen played by Joan Fontaine invites her greying husband, Harry (Warren Beatty) to their mountain top holiday home. She tells him she’s stopped drinking and wants a divorce, he leaves then is involved in a car accident. What happens next is almost unbelievable. S2 E33

episodes.name: One Step Beyond:  The Last Round

info.plot: Charles Bronson stars an aging boxer who finds himself in a haunted London boxing arena during World War II. Legend has it that if you see the ghost of a prize fighter bad things happen (S3 E16)
Epic Trails - discovering the world’s most beautiful locations.
Banff & Lake Louise In Summer - Canada
Australia\'s Northern Territory - Larapinta Trail In Kakadu National Park
Fiji - Village To Village Via Mountain Trails
New Zealand - Abel Tasman National Park
Peru - The Sacred Valley
Banff & Lake Louise In Winter - Canada
Jordan - 450 Mile Jordan Trail
Papua New Guinea - The Kokoda Track
British Columbia Canada - The 112 Mile Sunshine Coast Trail
Derbyshire England - 268 Mile Pennine Way Trail
Juneau Alaska - Mountain & Glacier Trails
Jamtland Sweden - Wilderness Trails
Wales - The Rugged Wales Coast Path
Newfoundland & Labrador Canada - The East Coast Trail
New South Wales Australia
California Usa - Yosemite National Park + Mohave Desert
Poland - Tatra & Pieniny Mountain Trails
Follow Naankuse, a wildlife sanctuary near Namibia’s capital. We follow their compelling conservation efforts - from saving the life of a baby baboon to collaring majestic desert elephants.

We start with a brief look at the plight of elephants in Namibia - the decline in their numbers and the reasons for it, like farmer-elephant conflict situations. In an effort to track their movements and thereby try to reduce human-animal conflicts 6 radio collars have been donated end these have to be fitted. Rudie and Marlice join officials from the Department of Environment and Tourism, and others in the Kunene region of Namibia to dart and collar six elephant cows.

At Naankuse the conservation of cheetahs involves researching them in the wild, managing them in captivity, rehabilitation back into nature and managing conflict situations with farmers. In this Episode Marlice joins Stuart Munro, one of the resident scientists at Naankuse as he measures cheetah footprints for a database.

As elsewhere in Africa, Namibia\'s rhinos are under severe threat from poaching. Rudie and Marlice join conservationist and officials from the Department of Environment and Tourism at a secret location that is thought to be unsafe. Here they dart a black rhino from a helicopter for translocation to a safer area. While the animal is sedated it provides scientists wit an ideal opportunity to collect samples and data. Part of its horn is also cut off to discourage poaching attempts.

The African Wild Dog, also known as Painted Dogs, is one of the most threatened animal species in Namibia, listed as critically endangered by the IUCN. Therefore every effort is made to conserve every individual dog that might be in danger. When Marlice gets a call from a farmer who has two young wild dogs that he keeps in an old farm dam she and Rudie waste no time in flying to the farm to collect the pups.

For Marlice, a visit to Harnas, her mother\'s Wildlife Sanctuary where she grew up, is a trip down memory lane as well as an opportunity to reconnect with old friends. She and her mother Marieta, start the day by visiting the band of mongooses and feeding them on the lawn. Then the troop of young baboons is taken for a walk, in this way they get exercise and get rid of their frustrations. Marieta then shows Marlice the pond with crocodiles, including some babies.

episodes.name: A Day in the Life of Rudie

info.plot: Rudie has his job cut out for the day. In order to move Jupiter, a caracal that arrived at Naankuse 6 months ago to a bigger enclosure Wild Dogs have to be moved to a cheetah enclosure, the cheetahs into a caracal enclosure and the caracals into another wild dog enclosure. After collecting some volunteers to help Rudie goes to the two cheetahs where he puts out capture cages with bait inside - hopefully the cheetahs will go into the cages.

When it comes to tour guides in Namibia Tommy Collard is a legend. Based in Swakopmund his area of expertise are the surrounding sand dunes of the Namib Desert, the oldest desert in the world. He starts his tour by showing the kids Zacheo and Nicklai the so-called desert newspaper - tracks left by insects and reptiles in the sand the night before. He and Zacheo follow a track up a dune and where it ends they dig out a little lizard that they immediately release.

episodes.name: A Day in the Life of Marlice

info.plot: Marlice often gets calls from members of the public who have animals that they can\'t look after any more - she then fetches these animals and take them to Naankuse where they are cared for. Today is such a day. She and the kids drive to a farmer in the North of Namibia who has 9 porcupines, 7 adults and 2 babies, that he keeps in an old farm dam - its time for them to move to a new and better home.

Marlice, Rudie and their kids visit the Walvis Bay region on the West coast of Namibia to explore this desolate shoreline and meet some of the people who are experts in the fauna and flora there. First they visit Sandwich Harbor a saline wetland that was declared a wetland of international importance by RAMSAR in 1995. Near the wetland their guide shows Rudie and Marlice how to find fresh water in this seemingly dry terrain.

Marlice\'s mother, Marieta needs some assistance with two animals at Harnas - her wildlife sanctuary, and Marlice and Rudie offer their help. One is a wild female baboon that comes into the semi-tame baboons enclosure in search of food. Because she is not part of the troop they are bullying her to the extent that she may die - she has to be taken out of the enclosure and be put in her own. The other animal that Marieta needs help with is a young leopard that has to be moved to a bigger enclosure.

The one animal species that Marlice gets the most of in at Naankuse is baboons. The episode starts with her arriving at Naankuse with a baby baboon. She tells us his story and gives him a bottle of milk before she takes him to the baby baboons where she introduces him to the leader of the troop. To her relief the leader immediately adopts the baby. Marlice then takes us to the juvenile group where she explains the hierarchy of a baboon troop in captivity as well as why baboons groom each other.

Rudie and Marlice fly to Hobatere, a concession area on the Western border of the Etosha National Park. Here they meet with Mesag Saal - a farmer, land owner and conservationist. They go on a game drive and stop at a waterhole. We are introduced to AfriCat, a non-profit organization whose aim is to conserve and protect Namibia\'s large carnivores within their natural habitats. Rudie and Marlice go with some of their rangers and lion monitors to the carcass of a kudu that had been killed by lions.

Marlice brings her kids up in the way she grew up - with a love and respect for animals. Her sons Zacheo and Nicklai and their friends are fortunate to be on a place like Naankuse where they are in constant contact with a large variety of wild and domestic animals. In this episode Marlice, her two kids and a friend start by feeding and playing with 2 baby warthogs, a baby porcupine and a kitten in her lounge.
From the land of the rising sun to the pearl of the Pacific, series one of The Travel Bug takes you to unique, exciting and spectacular destinations that every traveller longs to see.

Often considered the jewel of the Pacific, Tahiti has some of the world’s most amazing beaches and aquatic life. But beyond the appeal of the warm ocean and colourful reefs are the contrasting influences of Polynesian Islanders and the French. The islands that make up this scenic getaway contain world-class resorts that provide an abundance of activities.

Papua New Guinea is a diverse and dramatic landscape, with unique culture, a colourful history, adventure and natural diversity unlike anywhere else on earth. The mostly untouched landscapes of this beautiful nation and the friendly people that inhabit it make it the perfect location for holiday-makers with adventure in their blood.

episodes.name: Japan, Part I (Journey across Honshu Island)

info.plot: Japan is a land of extremes, where sprawling cities and bright lights give way to snow-capped mountains and rice patties. The unique Japanese culture can only be described as quirky, and once you delve beneath the surface and escape to the little-explored parts of the country you come to learn that Japan really is the land of the rising fun!

Tokyo is one of the must visit cities of the world. It epitomises urban excess and is a sprawling metropolis that never shuts down. We explore some of the quirkiest parts of the city to explore the people, technology and culture that make this such a special place: from eating at a ninja themed restaurant to watching the robot Asimo at work.

The Philippines is a beautiful and exotic nation. The sprawling archipelago that forms this special part of the world contains countless islands, sandy beaches and smiling faces. The Philippines has unusual animals, weird foods and a colourful history, but best of all it is a destination where one day you can relax in a luxury resort, then the next you can get dirty in a street market.

Starting in one of the world’s great cities – Sydney we travel over the Harbour Bridge and dine with koalas, before heading into the Blue Mountains and out to the far west to the ancient landscape of Mungo National Park. This desert landscape is one of the most scenic and unique environments in the world and has a fascinating story.

Having explored the streets of Berlin and the nearby countryside, it’s time to hit the road west and make his way across the country. The first stop is Wolfsburg, a city built around the incredible Volkswagen factory. From there, it’s off to Cologne before following the compass south along the beautiful River Rhine.

We hop on board a luxury expedition cruise ship and heading into the wild and rugged Kimberley Coast of Western Australia. We explore everything from the ancient aboriginal rock art, to unique wildlife and wonders of Mother Nature. This expedition takes in all the highlights of the Kimberley and it’s all done in 5-star comfort!

This time, we start the journey in the green pastures of Northern Ireland. It may only be a small nation, but within its borders there’s a whole lot to see. It’s a dramatic country in more ways than one. It all starts in the big smoke of Belfast, before heading to Downpatrick to learn about St Pat, before moving north on the Causeway Coastal Route.

This episode starts at the most visited site in Northern Ireland, The Giant’s Causeway. It’s a dramatic coastal landmark that draws visitors from around the world. Then it’s off to the historic city of Londonderry, on the banks of the Foyle River. From there we head underground at the Subterranean National Park, before putting on an apron for a lesson in Irish cooking.

episodes.name: Taiwan, Part II (West Coast and Interior)

info.plot: The tropical north of Australia is a favourite for Aussies looking for a holiday where you can walk on secluded beaches, snorkel in warm, clear waters, relax in a resort or get stuck into a bit of adrenalin pumping adventure. From The Great Barrier Reef and rainforest of the Daintree, to Port Douglas and Cape Tribulation, this episode is one for the adventurous travellers!

It all starts with a train ride from Tokyo, taking him north into the mountainous interior. From there we head to the ski resorts of Zao and Appi, before heading south, finishing the first leg of the trip in the tsunami-devastated region of Sendai.

This episode sees us hop on a flight south, to the warm and sunny island paradise of Okinawa. It’s a part of Japan that a lot of western tourists don’t often visit. Despite only being a few hours flight from Tokyo, the islands of Okinawa seem like they’re a world away – It’s a hidden gem you’re sure to fall in love with!

This season’s finale takes us back to some of the highlights of the series, as well as a couple of amazing places that we couldn\'t fit in. This includes a visit to the beautiful city of Frankfurt, and fishing for barramundi on a crocodile infested billabong in The Northern Territory. It’s a fun and adventurous episode that will leave you clamouring for more!

In Epic Exploring YouTube stars Josh and Cody are on a mission. Together with Urban Exploring friends they travel around the world in search of the most spectacular abandoned locations on the planet.

In this episode Josh travels to Tallinn in Estonia with urban explorer Steve Duncan where they explore Patarei Prison. Meanwhile Cody is in Vietnam with his friend Sherman Mak and travels to Pan Thiet in search of abandoned amusement park Soui Cat.

This time urban explorers Josh and Cody separately visit Germany and Morocco in search of astonishing abandoned locations including Wünsdorf the forbidden city near Berlin and an abandoned filmset in the Sahara desert used for Game of Thrones.

Josh and Cody are separately visiting Georgia and France. Cody together with rooftopper Harry Gallagher undertakes a cable car trip known as \'Stalin’s coffin\'. Josh is in France searching for abandoned chateaus with globetrotter Lexie Limitless.

Josh and Cody are diving into the underworld. This time Josh explores the abandoned German mining industry including an encounter with a Police squad and in England Cody explores an old Soviet submarine in the English Medway river.

Cody encounters wild animals and thrilling attractions in abandoned Six Flags New Orleans. Meanwhile Josh is in Cyprus where the UN peace keeping force allows him to explore the abandoned Nicosia International Airport and the UN bufferzone.

Together with rooftopper Elaina Hammeken Josh explores an incredible radio telescope from the Soviet era in Armenia while Cody experiences an astonishing trip through the Greek mining industry of Ptolemaida with his travel companion Elvis Brauer.

While Cody explores lost industries in the ‘ugliest’ city in the world with freerunner Abudi Alsagoff Josh together with his old neighborhood friend John Yurei is in the famous American prison \'Joliet\' where prisoners build their own cells.

Josh and urban exploring-legend Steve Duncan travel to the arctic island of Spitsbergen Norway where there is an old Soviet mining town waiting to be explored. Meanwhile Cody explores the dark and cruel history of Goli Otok prison in Croatia.
Cody is in Namibia following in the footsteps of German diamond seekers hearing stories of thieves and smugglers. Josh is in Albania and finds abandoned fighter jets and a secret factory.

The final episode reunites Josh and Cody after months of travelling separately this time to the nuclear disaster area of Fukushima in Japan. Meanwhile they look back at their adventures and reveal the result of their rankings of locations.
Supercar Blondie gets unrivalled access to some of the World’s most exclusive cars. On this trip she’s taken out of her comfort zone and embedded in alternative car cultures across the USA.

Supercar Blondie goes to Hollywood arriving in a million dollar V12 Ferrari. In the ‘City of Angels’ Alex is brought into contact with the Brotherhood of Racing a community of drivers looking to create safe racing conditions for amateurs.

Given special access to a 2 million dollar exclusive McClaren Senna Supercar Blondie digs under the surface to uncover gang feuds in the SLAB (Slow Low and Bangin’) community and meets up with legendary hip hop artists Slim Thug and Paul Wall.

Supercar Blondie goes to Hollywood arriving in a million dollar V12 Ferrari. In the ‘City of Angels’ Alex is brought into contact with the Brotherhood of Racing, a community of drivers looking to create safe racing conditions for amateurs.

Supercar Blondie is given the keys to a five million dollar Pagani Huayra L’Ultimo as she explores the sub-culture of lowriders with the seal of approval from Horacio Pagani himself. Will she be accepted into this tribe?

Supercar Blondie arrives in ‘Motor City’ in the dead of winter but given access to a half million dollar new Ford GT raises her spirits. Her goal is to learn more about muscle cars born in Detroit and her journey takes her in different directions.

Supercar Blondie hits New York City in a four million dollar rare Lamborghini Centenario. Her quest is to track down the players in the underground drift driving scene and visit the exclusive Manhattan Motor Club.

Forget fake scares—this is real. Join Sean Kenna, Sean Owen, and Karl Hassall as they explore Britain’s darkest, most haunted places. Dark Territory pushes the limits of ghost hunting, with paranormal encounters that are anything but made-up. Ready to believe?

The Dark Territory crew returns to the place that started it all—The Leopard Hotel. With its Victorian past and personal paranormal history, the team hopes the spirits remember them. An eerie reunion with the unknown.

A museum of haunted objects, built inside a former cinema, has ghost hunters running scared. The Dark Territory team dives in to face the cursed items and unexplained energy head-on. Get ready for one of their most intense investigations yet.

A secret Cold War bunker turned museum, Hack Green has become a hotspot for eerie encounters. The Dark Territory team explores why this wartime relic—built for a war that never came—now whispers with voices from the past. Ready to go underground?

With Coronavirus restrictions beginning to lift in England, the boys get back to what they do best... getting hopelessly lost in a deep forest, reknown for supernatural sightings! From the infamous black-eyed children, to warewolves, UFO’s and aliens, for some unknown reason Cannock Chase is said to be a hub for paranormal activity!

The Dark Territory team heads deep into a 17th-century silver mine to investigate centuries of mystery. Visitors and staff have reported eerie events—now it’s time to find out what really lurks in the tunnels of Silver Mountain. Underground just got unsettling.

Deep in a 19th-century fort, the Dark Territory team faces something they may never forget. As fear takes over, they begin to question what they’ve disturbed—and how far they’re willing to go to face it. Some tunnels should stay sealed…

At Mill Street Barracks—once a morgue, now a hotspot for hauntings—the team tests a Ouija board to connect with whatever still lingers. Dark Territory: Mill Street Barracks is a deep dive into one of England’s eeriest locations. Hope you’re not watching alone.

The Dark Territory team confronts one of the UK’s darkest legends—the Ancient Ram Inn. Known as England’s most haunted building, it’s a place that even seasoned ghost hunters fear. What they find inside is anything but welcoming.
Discover the fascinating lands of Asia, where opulent images allow us to experience the unique beauty of nature and the stories of people and animals that live in a world that remains untouched.

episodes.name: Kaziranga National Park: India – Where Wild Things Roam

info.plot: The rare one-horned rhinoceros is being poached in Kaziranga National Park.  Herds of elephants are on the move and a new born baby elephant has lost its mother. Some people who live in Kaziranga are willing to risk their lives to make sure the wild animals stay safe. While others must guard their families against danger in the night.

episodes.name: Tun Sakaran Marine Park: Malaysia – Paradise Found

info.plot: One of the world\'s most diverse reef systems off the coast of Borneo has just become protected - Tun Sakaran Marine Park.  It\'s a magical paradise where an ancient volcano once erupted.  Hundreds of species of corals and fish live here and so do many people who rely on the sea to survive.  But in Tun Sakaran Marine Park precious marine creatures now come first and humans must find new ways to live.

episodes.name: Aso-Kuju and Unzen-Amakusa National Parks: Japan – Under the Volcano

info.plot: On the top of a smoking volcano, on the southern island of Kyushu in Japan, a Shinto priest performs rights that keep his community safe.  200 years ago his town was completely destroyed.  The last eruption here was in 1991.  Forty-three scientists, firemen and media workers died in the fire and ash.  A volcanologist who witnessed the death of his colleagues is concerned.  Yet another volcano on Kyoto now threatens to erupt.  But nature has created rare beauty here.

episodes.name: Mt Tianzhu and Mt Fanjing National Parks: China

info.plot: The man who saved the last colony of Guizhou golden monkeys is getting old.  He must pass responsibility on to the next in line.  But will his successor be able to keep the monkeys safe?  A Buddhist master has had the peace of her convent shattered.  She needs to replenish her spirit on the peak of a sacred mountain but she is afraid of heights!  Wild places still exist and peace can still be found in the world\'s most populous continent.

episodes.name: Gir National Park: India – Asia\'s Last Lion

info.plot: Gir National Park: India – Asia\'s Last Lion
Kinabatangan River: Borneo – Forgotten Paradise
Vietnam

episodes.name: Great Gobi National Park: Mongolia – Following the Wild Camels

info.plot: Great Gobi National Park: Mongolia – Following the Wild Camels

Explore the untouched beauty of Gaoligongshan Park, a hidden Himalayan treasure in China. From golden peaks to rare wildlife, this stunning documentary reveals one of the world’s richest natural wonders.

Episode 2 kicks off with a visit to the Zip Zap Circus School. When having fun and learning new, exciting skills brings children from all walks of life together in a positive learning environment.
In the first Episode of this weekly fast-paced, environmental magazine we visit a surf school to find out how catching waves can give troubled youths a new start and positive outlook on life.

name: Echo And The Elephants Of Amboseli

info.plot: Scientist Cynthia Moss and the Amboseli Trust for Elephants spent 2 months a year for several years following "Echo", the 60 yr old Kenyan elephant matriarch.

When the rains disappear, survival gets real. Watch Echo and her elephant family battle Kenya’s brutal dry season in Amboseli National Park. It’s a raw look at nature’s toughest test—where every water hole could mean life or death. Totally gripping wildlife drama you won’t want to miss.

episodes.name: Echo Elephants: Calves in Trouble Episode - Free

info.plot: Baby elephants in danger? Yeah, it’s as intense as it sounds. Watch Echo’s family scramble to protect their youngest when trouble strikes in Amboseli. These little ones face mega challenges—from predators to getting lost. It’s heart-pounding wildlife drama that’ll keep you totally hooked.

On the plains of Amboseli, the rains are over two months late. Echo brings the family to the palms to eat the last leaves. The wise matriarch resists the temptation to take them to inhabited areas where fresh crops are springing up and conflict waits. But young bulls on their own are running into trouble…

In the relentless drought, the youngest calves are starving. Hunger is driving elephants to forage on surrounding farms. Echo’s wise head keeps her family to the swamp. Rains arrive, but after five days, the much-needed downpours dwindle to sparse showers. Echo must bring the family through the long ordeal without loss, but it might be harder said than done.

The rains bring new life. Lush new grass is saving the 58 elephant families from hunger. An extraordinary annual reunion brings hundreds of elephants together in scenes of celebration, play and romance. Meanwhile, big bull Vronsky is on the hunt for a mate and ready to fight. He begins an epic battle with a rival, Gomer, starting by fighting for nine hours without a break.

In Amboseli, nine months of unrelenting drought have given way to longed-for rains. The elephants now have enough to eat. Echo is taking the family on a day out to the Snipe River. Isaiah’s spear wound needs urgent treatment. But the elephants are ruining new crops. A new idea could put an end to their destruction: it’s based on a simple piece of string.

After months of hunger, Echo’s family are enjoying good times. The matriarch and her family are dustbathing at the safe home where Echo shelters her young. Even when they run to defend themselves, they are only pretending to be attacked! This is the time when magnificent males such as Keyhole reappear. His arrival excites Echo\'s whole family. But around him, Amboseli’s finest bulls battle to breed.

In Amboseli, the harsh drought is tightening its grip. Echo and all the elephant families go to sleep and wake up hungry. Rain is falling, but in dangerous areas, drawing elephants into increasing conflict with farmers. Luckily Sinya, the calf that fell in the well is recovering at the orphanage in Nairobi.

It’s the baby boom. In Echo\'s family, her niece Elettra is a mother for the first time. She has a lot to learn. Three day-old baby Evaline finds the going tough, as her mother fails to watch over her, and the others send the adventurous youngster packing. Isaiah’s leg wound becomes re-infected, and he needs the vet again.

For Echo and her family, the weeks after the rains are good times. They have time to take a mudbath together. Baby Evaline is a handful, and new mother Elettra still hasn’t learnt to stay close to her. Echo’s unpopular granddaughter Edwina breaks away and gives birth, but lions teach Edwina how hard it is to bring up a calf without the protection of the family.

Norah and Soila race to Amboseli’s outlands to help rescue Qualida, an elephant matriarch trapped in mud. In her secret spot, Echo wakes to face a rebellion: half her family leave to eat at the palms. After four hours trekking through dry bushland, the incoming waves of thirsty elephants from the surrounding hills are nearing water. But trouble with the Maasai begins to boil over…
Sentient machines. Big questions. Zero chill. Unearth dives deep into the wild side of AI and what it means to be human—one mind-bending mystery at a time.
